"Bring Out The Feisty In You"

Customers are the Kings and we at The Feisty One understand that and always strive to deliver best customer experience.


Happy Shopping!!!

idea: Aumsat Technologies LLP. provides a comprehensive precision-driven satellite-based hydrogeological evaluation to its users in industrial, urban greenspace, groundwater and agriculture sectors by evaluating the associations between lithology, geomorphology, soils and land cover. Our Satellite-based analytics can provide information about groundwater locations, Vegetation health, Soil moisture, nitrogen content, agrometeorology, and 3D analysis at the various scales of operations ranging from field level to a country level. This data will give detailed information about the potential groundwater zone, groundwater flow direction, vegetation phenology, soil status, and climatic conditions.
name: AUMSAT TECHNOLOGIES LLP

idea:
Grokisan is a start-up founded by a team of Doctor, IITian,PG Management, Engineering background personnel.


It is an Agro-Healtech platform powered by Artificial Intelligence Algorithms.


It provides Diet plans and it's ingredients organic and inorganic residue free vegetables, fruits, groceries,diet smoothies,dairy products etc to its customers at their doorstep.


Grokisan is disrupting market by solving a major gap between healthy diet plan and availability of its ingredients to people having lifestyle diseases like Diabetes, Hypertension, obesity, malnutrition,Female and children harmonal and diseases problem facing because of unhealthy eating habits .


Grokisan is helping marginalised farmers by providing them rates higher than market and also guiding them through proper agriculture guidance through Agriculture experts and thus contributing to honourable PM's aim in doubling their income.


We are using latest techniques to make inorganic vegetables and fruits residue free .


We need funds for scaling our company and therefore to help people by taking care of their health by proper diet plans and healthy vegetables,fruits, groceries,dairy products, smoothies etc  .
name: GROKISAN AGROTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Kidlet's vision is to help students across the entire spectrum of schooling to achieve their learning outcomes and have a strong foundation for higher learning through the generation of usable educational data.

We want to use the generated  educational data to improve learning and to meet the personalised needs of every single student.


Our Mission:

1. Help schools move to the digital age one step at a time.

2. Enable schools and education administrators to make better information-backed decisions

3. Move the system to a more objective method of evaluation for both students as well as teachers.

4. Help students across the entire spectrum learn the way which is best suited to their capabilities, strengths and learning processes.

5. Provide everyone involved in a studentâ€™s education (school, teachers, classes, parents) with the tools to understand learning progress and learning gaps, and to fill the gaps in learning.
name: Kidlet - Helping children learn better
